Topic.Title: Anyone here good at drawing ASCII?

Posts.EditableText: Anyone here good at drawing ASCII? I think it would be cool to have an ASCII picture of a sword and shield or a dragon or something on the title screen of my upcoming game, but I'm hopeless at it. Anybody who did help would get full credit in the manual of course.
Posts.HTML: Anyone here good at drawing ASCII? I think it would be cool to have an ASCII picture of a sword and shield or a dragon or something on the title screen of my upcoming game, but I'm hopeless at it. Anybody who did help would get full credit in the manual of course.

Posts.EditableText: I used to have some ASCII art of the NOVA 100 Logo.  Of course, you guys wouldn't know what NOVA is.  It's a radio station down here in Australia.
Posts.HTML: I used to have some ASCII art of the NOVA 100 Logo.  Of course, you guys wouldn't know what NOVA is.  It's a radio station down here in Australia.
